legislative_changes.Heading: Forest Act
legislative_changes.data: The Act regulates sustainable forestry and biodiversity preservation, implemented after environmental consultations and amendments to previous laws.

legislative_changes.Heading: National Forest Strategy 2025
legislative_changes.data: This strategy promotes sustainable forest management, developed in coordination with forestry stakeholders.

legislative_changes.Heading: Climate Program for the Land Use Sector
legislative_changes.data: The program targets carbon sequestration in forests to meet emissions goals, supported by both government and forestry sectors.

legislative_changes.Heading: Biodiversity Strategy and Action Plan
legislative_changes.data: Focused on conserving forest biodiversity, the plan was endorsed by the Ministry of the Environment following stakeholder consultations.

legislative_changes.Heading: Water Services Act
legislative_changes.data: Regulating water utilities to improve water quality, the Act was developed in compliance with EU water standards.

legislative_changes.Heading: National Program for the Protection of the Baltic Sea
legislative_changes.data: This program aims to reduce pollution in the Baltic Sea, developed in cooperation with neighboring countries.

legislative_changes.Heading: River Basin Management Plan
legislative_changes.data: The plan manages water resources across river basins to reduce pollution, aligned with EU Water Framework Directive.

legislative_changes.Heading: Flood Risk Management Act
legislative_changes.data: Addressing flood risks through improved waterway management, the act was passed with input from environmental experts.

legislative_changes.Heading: Environmental Protection Act
legislative_changes.data: This act sets emission limits for industries to minimize pollution, passed through Parliament in alignment with EU directives.

legislative_changes.Heading: Air Quality Protection Plan
legislative_changes.data: The plan outlines measures for reducing industrial emissions, developed through the Ministry of the Environment.

legislative_changes.Heading: Circular Economy Roadmap
legislative_changes.data: A strategy promoting recycling and waste reduction to limit industrial pollution, supported by cross-party parliamentary approval.

legislative_changes.Heading: Climate Neutrality Act
legislative_changes.data: The Act sets ambitious targets for carbon neutrality by 2035, with provisions for reducing industrial emissions.

legislative_changes.Heading: Soil Protection Act
legislative_changes.data: The act regulates soil contamination and mandates rehabilitation of degraded land, developed in line with EU environmental policies.

legislative_changes.Heading: Agri-Environmental Program
legislative_changes.data: This program encourages sustainable farming practices to protect soil health, funded by the Ministry of Agriculture.

legislative_changes.Heading: National Soil Strategy
legislative_changes.data: The strategy aims to enhance soil carbon sequestration and improve soil health, backed by government support and research institutions.

legislative_changes.Heading: Sustainable Land Management Initiative
legislative_changes.data: An initiative to rehabilitate soils and improve agricultural practices, led by the Ministry of the Environment.
